named-native-query.name: AccountEntity.deleteByCustomerCpf
named-native-query.query: DELETE FROM account WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM customer WHERE cpf = :cpf)

named-native-query.name: AccountEntity.deleteByCustomerCustomerId
named-native-query.query: DELETE FROM account WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM customer WHERE customer_id = ?1)
